text: thumb|Map of Sōwa, Ibaraki was a town located in Sashima District, Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 48,810 and a density of 924.43 persons per km². The total area was 52.80 km². On September 12, 2005, Sōwa, along with the town of Sanwa (also from Sashima District), was merged into the expanded city of Koga. Sōwa's town hall is used as the new Koga City Hall. ==External links== * Koga official website Category:Dissolved municipalities of Ibaraki Prefecture
title: Sōwa, Ibaraki
